name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-PD-24PACK-V-NEON
categories: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Clay & Dough
title: Play-Doh Modeling Compound 24-Pack Case of Colors - Neon Theme
description: Squish, shape, and create with this special Neon-themed 24-pack of Play-Doh modeling compound! Featuring a vibrant assortment of electrifying neon colors, this bulk pack is perfect for parties, classrooms, and endless creative fun. Non-toxic and easy to use.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-PD-24PACK-V-SPARKLE
categories: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Clay & Dough
title: Play-Doh Modeling Compound 24-Pack Case of Colors - Sparkle Theme
description: Add a touch of glitter to your creations! This 24-pack of Play-Doh features a dazzling assortment of sparkle-infused colors. Perfect for making shimmering masterpieces, this bulk pack is great for sharing with friends. Non-toxic.

title: Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 Blaster, 12 Darts, 6-Dart Rotating Drum - Blue
description: Gear up for battle with the Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 blaster in a cool blue design! Features a 6-dart rotating drum, tactical rails, and stock/barrel attachment points. Comes with 12 Official Nerf Elite darts.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/TRU-RF-1800-V-WOODRAIL
categories: Toys & Games > Outdoor Play > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer Big Red Classic ATW with Wooden Stake Sides
description: The classic red wagon you loved as a kid, now with high wooden stake sides. Perfect for hauling toys, and giving little ones a ride. Features all-terrain air tires for a smooth ride and an extra-long handle that folds under for easy storage.

categories: Toys & Games > Outdoor Play > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer Big Red Classic ATW with UV Protection Canopy
description: The classic red wagon you loved as a kid, now with a removeable UV protection canopy to keep your little ones safe from the sun. Features all-terrain air tires for a smooth ride and an extra-long handle that folds under for easy storage.

title: VTech KidiZoom Creator Cam, HD Video Camera for Kids - Red
description: Be the star of your own video universe with the KidiZoom Creator Cam in vibrant red! Create awesome videos with this high-definition video camera kit. Use the included green screen and 20+ animated backgrounds to get chased by a T-Rex, go to outer space or make yourself disappear!

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-LG-75337-V-BUNDLE
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO > LEGO Star Wars
title: LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker 75337 - ToysRUs Exclusive with Bonus Battle Droid Pack
description: Exclusive bundle! Build the LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker and get a bonus Battle Droid pack to expand your Clone Wars scenes. The AT-TE features posable legs, a 360-degree-rotating elevating heavy blaster cannon with 2 stud shooters, a detachable cockpit and 2 detailed cabins. Includes 5 LEGO minifigures and 3 LEGO droid figures.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-FP-GKH74-V-SIS
categories: Toys & Games > Infant & Preschool Toys > Learning & Educational
title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Sis
description: It's Puppy's sweet sister, Sis! This soft, cuddly friend responds to your baby's touch with exciting sing-along songs and phrases that introduce more than 100 first words, parts of the body, colors, shapes and more! And because every baby develops at their own pace, Sis comes with Smart Stages technology, so you can choose the level that's best for your child.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VT-80-549500-V-PINK
categories: Toys & Games > Electronics for Kids > Digital Cameras
title: VTech KidiZoom Creator Cam, HD Video Camera for Kids - Pink
description: Become a kid creator with the KidiZoom Creator Cam digital camera, now in a stylish pink! Create awesome videos with this high-definition video camera kit. Use the included green screen and 20+ animated backgrounds to get chased by a T-Rex, go to outer space or make yourself disappear! Set up your shot with the tabletop tripod/selfie stick and built-in microphone, then use the easy on-screen editing and creativity tools to create trick shots and time-lapse videos.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-MTL-HCD51-V-CONSTRUCT
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains, & Playsets > Die-Cast Vehicles
title: Matchbox 9-Car Gift Pack - Construction Zone Theme
description: Get the job done with the Matchbox Construction Zone 9-Car Gift Pack! This set includes 9 detailed, 1:64 scale die-cast construction vehicles, including a dump truck, bulldozer, and cement mixer. Each vehicle is ready for tough jobs and imaginative play. Perfect for collectors and kids alike.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-NERF-F5032-V-SONIC
categories: Toys & Games > Blasters & Foam Play
title: Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 Blaster, Sonic Green
description: Dominate the battlefield in style with the Sonic Green edition of the Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 blaster! It has a 6-dart rotating drum so you can fire 6 darts in a row. It has built-in customizing capabilities so you can upgrade it with Nerf accessories (sold separately). Includes 12 Official Nerf Elite darts.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-MD-9397-V-WOOD
categories: Toys & Games > Pretend Play > Kitchens & Play Food
title: Melissa & Doug Wooden Scoop and Serve Ice Cream Counter - Deluxe Edition
description: A deluxe, all-wooden version of the favorite Scoop & Serve Ice Cream Counter. This 28-piece wooden ice cream play set features a sturdy wooden countertop, eight wooden scoops of different-flavored ice cream, six assorted toppings, two cones, a cup, an ice cream scooper, tongs, and a wooden spoon. The scooper fits into a hole on top of the scoops to lift, stack, and release.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-HW-HGX10-V-MONSTER
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains, & Playsets > Racetracks
title: Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash Track Set - Monster Truck Edition
description: Crank up the competition with this Monster Truck edition of the Hot Wheels Criss Cross Crash track set! This sturdy elevated figure-eight track with four intersecting crash zones delivers amped up crashing action. The set includes one Hot Wheels Monster Truck and one 1:64 scale Hot Wheels vehicle to get the fun started.

categories: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Clay & Dough > Modeling Compounds
title: Play-Doh Modeling Compound 24-Pack Case of Colors - Confetti Collection
description: The Play-Doh 24-Pack is a mountain of creative fun! This special Confetti Collection features 24 assorted 3-ounce cans of Play-Doh modeling compound, each flecked with colorful bits of confetti for a party in every can. Perfect for party favors, classroom activities, and endless imaginative play.

categories: Toys & Games > Blasters & Foam Play
title: Nerf Elite 2.0 Commander RD-6 Blaster - Red Strike

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-RF-CANOPY
categories: Toys & Games > Riding Toys > Wagons
title: Radio Flyer Big Red Classic ATW Wagon with Canopy
description: The Radio Flyer Big Red Classic ATW, now with a protective UV canopy! This wagon combines a classic design with the added advantage of all-terrain air tires for a smooth ride and a removable canopy for sun protection. The extra-long handle folds under for easy storage.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-CATAN-WOOD
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Board Games
title: CATAN Board Game - Deluxe Wood Edition
description: Experience the classic game of CATAN like never before with this Deluxe Wood Edition. This heirloom-quality version features beautifully crafted 3D wooden tiles for terrain, settlements, cities, and roads. A must-have for the serious Catan enthusiast.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-FP-SAFARI
categories: Toys & Games > Preschool Toys > Little People
title: Fisher-Price Little People Caring for Animals Farm - Safari Friends Set
description: An exciting addition to the Caring for Animals Farm! This Safari Friends variant includes the classic farm playset plus an exclusive pack of safari animals: a friendly lion, a zebra, and a monkey. Toddlers can explore new animal sounds and imaginative play scenarios.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-HW-GLOW
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, RC, & Drones > Play Vehicles & Race Tracks
title: Hot Wheels Mario Kart Rainbow Road Raceway - Glow-in-the-Dark Track
description: Bring Rainbow Road to life in a whole new light! This special edition of the Hot Wheels Mario Kart Rainbow Road Raceway features glow-in-the-dark track pieces for thrilling nighttime races. The set includes an exclusive glow-painted King Boo and Mario die-cast karts.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-LG-DISPLAY
categories: Toys & Games > Building Sets & Blocks > LEGO
title: LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker 75337 - Collector's Edition with Display Case
description: The ultimate package for the dedicated LEGO Star Wars collector. This bundle includes the complete LEGO Star Wars AT-TE Walker (75337) set, plus a premium, custom-fit acrylic display case with a printed background of the Battle of Utapau to protect and showcase your creation.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-MD-150PC
categories: Toys & Games > Building Sets & Blocks > Wooden Blocks
title: Melissa & Doug Wooden Building Blocks Set - 150-Piece Deluxe Set
description: Expand your building horizons with the 150-Piece Deluxe Wooden Building Blocks Set from Melissa & Doug. This version offers 50 more blocks than the standard set, including new architectural shapes like arches and columns for bigger, more intricate structures.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU-VAR-MTL-POLICE
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, RC, & Drones > Play Vehicles & Race Tracks
title: Matchbox Action Drivers Airport Adventure Playset - Police Air Patrol Theme
description: Patrol the skies with the Police Air Patrol themed version of the Matchbox Airport Adventure playset! This variant features a police station color scheme, a police helicopter instead of a commercial plane, and includes one exclusive Matchbox police car.
